title: Enchanted Nightcrawler
summaries: The Enchanted Nightcrawler is a harmless critter that appears as a pink and sparkly Worm. They spawn naturally during a Meteor Shower when few clouds are in the sky (such as during a Lantern Night). They can also be obtained by crafting or opening a Can Of Worms. The Enchanted Nightcrawler has only 5 health and no defense, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

The Enchanted Nightcrawler can be caught with any <linked>Bug Net</linked> to be carried around in the <linked>inventory</linked> and released later, or crafted into animated decorative <linked>furniture</linked> (<linked>Enchanted Nightcrawler Cage</linked>). Once crafted, the Enchanted Nightcrawler cannot be released again.
The Enchanted Nightcrawler can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 35% bait power.

statistics.Sell: 20 SC
